nodes.text: The Sayormi Heartstriker was a small, bladed weapon utilized by the Sayormi monks of Kashyyyk, virtually identical in appearance to basic vibroknucklers. It was named for its ability to break through the rib cage and pierce the heart of an enemy.

The Sayormi Heartstriker was a weapon that appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
